backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing prompts, blog posts, user profiles, favorites, and access control with admin/user permissions and upgrade-safe state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and preloaded prompt records for initializing or upgrading backend data.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring routes, layout, lazy-loaded pages, theme provider, and global toasts.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first-time users to enter a name and create a profile using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Grid rendering category cards that link to the prompt library filtered by category.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines category metadata and a helper to fetch category info by key.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a 64×64 div showing one icon from a sprite sheet based on iconIndex.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: Button that copies provided text to clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Displays status alerts for form states including loading, success, and error.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, navigation links, and copyright message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, theme toggle, auth actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Toggles a prompt as favorite, requiring authentication and handling premium errors.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Card displaying a prompt summary with category, badges, copy button, and favorites toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Detailed prompt view with metadata, full text access, copy button, and conditional premium gating.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: UI component providing search, category, tier, and sort controls for filtering prompts and displaying active filters.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title and meta description tags based on provided SEO props.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing light, dark, and system themes with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown button that allows switching between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Thin wrapper returning the current user's profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook returning a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for prompts, favorites, admin checks, mutations, and user profile retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark themes with transitions and scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Helpers to build SEO-friendly blog post URLs and parse blog post IDs from slugs.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utilities to download one or multiple prompts as text files.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Functions to filter and sort prompts by search text, category, tier, and popularity/newness.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Generates URL slugs for prompts and parses prompt IDs from URL parameters.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic validation for email, name, and message inputs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with details about the platform's mission and offerings.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPromptsPage.tsx: Admin interface for creating new prompts with form validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Handles login flow, showing auth button and redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with links to individual post pages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a full blog post, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of prompt categories for browsing.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with input validation and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing profile info and favorite prompts with download support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section, call‑to‑action buttons, category grid, and feature highlights with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays free and premium membership plans, highlighting current user status and pricing with upgrade or downgrade options.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Newsletter signup form with email validation, submission status handling, and informational sections plus SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single prompt's details, handling loading and not‑found states and providing navigation back to the library.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Fetches all prompts and provides search, filtering, sorting, and category syncing with URL parameters to display filtered results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests focused on adding and surfacing 30 new AI prompts across categories.
